name: At-Risk-Incidents-Notification
description: This script will be used with the playbook "JOB-Get At Risk Incidents" playbook. This will be used to segregate all the incident whose sla is on risk. We have created 4 buckets of 15 minutes (Red,Orange,Purple,Blue) used to track risk incident on the basis of time left in sla breached. SLA field involved is contain sla and resolution sla.
author: Shubham Agarwal
